name: The Witching Hour (lnager)
description:
Small game where you collect mushrooms to buy potion ingredients for your witch shop. 

How to Play:
1. Click the witches hat to get mushrooms. Once you have enough buy upgrades by clicking the buttons on the right. These will help you collect mushrooms faster.

Credits:
All art done by Ren Nager
All programming done by Lindsey Nager
